text: Julián Marías Aguilera (June 17, 1914 – December 15, 2005) was a Spanish philosopher. He is the author of History of Philosophy (1941) written in Spanish on the subject of the history of philosophy. He was a pupil of the Spanish philosopher José Ortega y Gasset. Category:Spanish philosophers Category:2005 deaths Category:1914 births Category:Spanish writers
title: Julián Marías
